text: Jos√© Daniel Ortega Saavedra (; born November 11, 1945) is a Nicaraguan politician. He has been President of Nicaragua since 2007."Ortega wins Nicaraguan election", BBC News, 8 November 2006. He also served as President of Nicaragua from 1979 to 1990. In 2025, he became Co-president of Nicaragua alongside his wife Rosario Murillo. In November 2021, Daniel Ortega, was re- elected for a fourth five-year term with 75% of the vote, according to the first partial official results released by the Supreme Electoral Council. ==References== ==Other websites== *Office of the President Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Nicaragua Category:Current national leaders Category:Dictators Category:Marxists
title: Daniel Ortega
